text: tavada “magē deviyanē! māva (madīnāvehi ætuḷu kaḷa yutuya yayi oba adahas kaḷahot) hon̆da andaminma ætuḷu vīmaṭa salasvanu (mænava!) (makkāvē siṭa māva piṭamaṁ kaḷa yutuya yayi oba adahas kaḷahot) hon̆da andaminma māva piṭat vannaṭa salasvanu (mænava!) oba sannidhānayē æti jayagrahaṇayak oba mā haṭa udavvak vaśayen labā denu mænava!” yayi (nabiyē!) oba prārthanā karanu mænava
